Title: WCF Database Message logger suite
Description: The WCF Database message logger is a service and client behavior. Which'll log incoming and outgoing message to a database. The database format is inspired by Enterprise Logging but more tailermade just for message logging. The centralized feature is correlation between messages.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The WCF Database message logger is a service and client behavior. Which'll log incoming and outgoing message to a database. The database format is inspired by Enterprise Logging but more tailermade just for message logging. The centralized feature is correlation between messages.

Features
It's first goal is to provide sourcecode in environments where there are multiple (WCF)services. It's possible to log the messages directly to the database or to log the messages via a service. (This is usefull if you also want to have your messagelogtraffic via the ESB.) The suite is also going to be provided with a messagelogviewer based on WCF Dataservices.
